data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: Share a time that you disagreed with one of your teachers. How did you handle the disagreement? What did you learn from this experience that will help you interact with other teachers?
data.answer: I would like to share a time when I disagreed with one of my teachers. It was a math class when I was in high school. I disagreed with the solution to a math problem presented by the teacher. Instead, I raised an alternative solution. We engaged in meaningful discussion and the result is that both solutions are correct with different angles towards solving the problem. I learned from this experience that will help me interact with other teachers. That is, I learned how to raise an argument and discuss it in detail with the teacher.
